headline: This Infusion Therapy Leader Is Undervalued. Buy the Stock.
summary: For millions of people living with chronic disease or acute illness, the choice to receive treatment anywhere other than a hospital is an easy one.  Option Care Health  is capitalizing on the growing demand for at-home and alternate-site medical services.  The Bannockburn, Ill.-based company is the nation’s largest provider of infusion therapies, administering often complex medications at patients’ homes or at one of its more than 170 ambulatory clinics across the U.S.
